channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins IBM Application Security on Cloud Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins IBM Application Security on Cloud Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10391|2024-08-04T22:17:20.569Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ibm%20application%20security%20on%20cloud%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins IBM Application Security on Cloud Plugin 1.2.4 and earlier transmitted configured passwords in plain text as part of job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.
